sentences.en: "It's only a sprain," Paula said brusquely.
sentences.cn: “只是扭伤了筋，”葆拉简短生硬地说。

sentences.en: He backs against the piano and bows brusquely.
sentences.cn: 他退到钢琴那里冷淡地点点头.

sentences.en: He cut off the laughing brusquely with a gesture.
sentences.cn: 他做了个手势,猛然地制止了笑声.

sentences.en: She asking questions so brusquely and giving orders so decisively Pork's eyebrows went up in mystification.
sentences.cn: 她一开口便突如起来提出问题,并果断发布命令.波克翻着眼睛手足无措了.

sentences.en: Then brusquely his tardy rage flamed up.
sentences.cn: 跟着,他那迟迟不来的怒火猛的冒起来了.

sentences.en: There was a laugh which he cut off brusquely with a gesture.
sentences.cn: 人们发出一阵哄笑,他做了个手势,猛然制止了笑声.
